bibl.title: Byzantine Coins from Jabal al-Tarif.
bibl.note: Nag Hammadi excavations 1975 and 1978. Byzantine folles and dodecanummia from Anastasius I to the Arab conquest. Provenance: cave T8. Present location: Institute for Antiquity and Christianity, Claremont, California, and Coptic Museum, Cairo.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.seg: Goehring James E., Byzantine Coins from Jabal al-Tarif.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 26 (1984) pp. 32-41, 5 ill.

Nag Hammadi excavations 1975 and 1978. Byzantine folles and dodecanummia from Anastasius I to the Arab conquest. Provenance: cave T8. Present location: Institute for Antiquity and Christianity, Claremont, California, and Coptic Museum, Cairo.
